'''Radiant Spincrystal 1''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Dawn Winery Theme (City of Winds and Idylls)|Dawn Winery Theme]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next on top of a barrel near [[Ernest]] outside of [[Dawn Winery Manor]].
